interestingcomments.content:
What travel tripod would you recommend that can well support a Fujinon XF 55-200? /!/  

I currently have a Benro iSmart ISO5, which was incredible for most other XF lenses, until I got the XF 55-200. The ball head doesn't lock into place sometimes, especially if I try portrait orientation with this lens.

I would also like something which is comparable in tripod weight (the Benro is only 0.92 kg) and can support at least 4 kg. Plus, I use a metal grip L-bracket (like [this](https://www.amazon.com/Meike-Aluminum-Release-Bracket-Fujifilm/dp/B0759MTK61)) with my Fuji X-T20, so it would be great to have Arca Swiss plate so I don't have to attach a plate every time I want to use the tripod.

Thanks, everyone.

thanks, everyone.

interestingcomments.content:
How can I unlock the "image rotate" option in the playback menu? /!/ As the title says, does anyone know? The option on my camera is greyed out.

I have an X-T20 and I'm trying to print photos to Instax S-P2 but the normal orientation of how you would take portraits on the camera is printed upside down on the film.

It would be great if I would be able to rotate the photo in the camera before printing.
